movie.title: The Girl Next Door
movie.description: Exceptionally ambitious high schooler Matthew has aspirations for a career in politics when he falls in love with his gorgeous 19-year-old neighbor, Danielle. But Matthew's bright future is jeopardized when he finds Danielle was once a porn star. As Danielle's past catches up with her, Matthew's love for her forces him to re-evaluate his goals.

movie.title: A Frivolous Widow
movie.description: In 1950s northern Italy, a woman tests her fiancÃ©'s love and passion by trying to break his commitment to premarital chastity.

movie.title: The Village'S Protector
movie.description: A wave of chilling serial murders emerges, marked by the gruesome decay of male victims' secret part. As the police investigate, they confront eerie local myths and dark secrets.

movie.title: A Funny Job
movie.description: A clinically depressed teenager gets a new start after he checks himself into an adult psychiatric ward.

movie.title: A Desperate Woman
movie.description: A romantic comedy about 30-year-old Leo and a 40-year-old, pregnant single mother of three, Maarit.

movie.title: A Stranger In My Bed
movie.description: "A Stranger" is an Irish no-budget short film which follows two young friends who struggle as both their friendship, and their lives, face a possible ending.

movie.title: The Parking Stranger
movie.description: An absurd comedy about a Parking Enforcement Officer, who - despite constant abuse from the public - finds truth, honour and serenity in the act of ticketing. His religious devotion to the work is challenged however, when his best friend and personal mentor is run down by an irate motorist and knocked into a deep coma. With the help of an angry young filmmaker, a Russian sound recordist hoping to break into the local film industry, and a seven-foot tall tow truck driver from Quebec, he embarks on a comical investigation into... the delicate art of parking.

movie.title: Unfinished Business
movie.description: A hard-working small business owner and his two associates travel to Europe to close the most important deal of their lives. But what began as a routine business trip goes off the rails in every imaginable â€“ and unimaginable â€“ way, including unplanned stops at a massive sex fetish event and a global economic summit.

movie.title: The Big Shot
movie.description: A young man runs into trouble when he buys an auto court, only to find out that its located next to a swamp that drives away all potential customers.

movie.title: A Family On The Run
movie.description: Set in the 1990s, this film uses black humour to cast a sharp, satirical eye at the problems facing modern Japanese families. Hiroshi accidentally hits a young woman with his car and flees in panic. He confesses to his wife, Yoko, who persuades him to keep quiet as his arrest would mean the end for their already troubled family. Their daughter is having an affair with a married man, their son is being bullied and refusing to go to school and their grandfather is becoming more difficult. Yoko urges the family to move the car into the living room in order to destroy the evidence by taking it apart. Hiroshi finally decides to do the honest thing but a series of bizarre incidents then ensues...

movie.title: The Liar
movie.description: Adrian Healey is clever, charming and witty, but above all he is an expert liar. His unparalleled ability to consummately cheat and deceive is a skill that does not go unrecognized at one of Englandâ€™s finest educational establishments where he is groomed in the dark arts of spy craft. Whilst pursuing his first romance, Adrian is thrown into a wild and thrilling web of espionage. In a world where all is not what it seems, has Adrian met his match?

movie.title: Imminent Danger
movie.description: Whoops! After an unintentional button pressing incident alerting Earth of its impending demise, Gail must find a way to reverse this misunderstanding and save the world!

movie.title: More Than Friends
movie.description: Matty Perlman and Alan Corkus are old friends. He wants them to be more than friends. Sometimes she does too.

movie.title: Saturday Night Lover
movie.description: The film centers around a group of four childhood friends, Stanley, Sunil, Babu, and Ravi. After a long separation, they reunite and embark on a journey to rekindle their bond.

movie.title: The Aused & The Hunter
movie.description: An aspiring author looking to get more out of life takes up a writing residency and finds herself in the sort of romantic entanglements that could come from the pages of a Jane Austen novel.

movie.title: The Art Of Seduction
movie.description: Jean-FranÃ§ois is a psychoanalyst in love with one of his patients. When she decides to stop therapy, Jean-FranÃ§ois at last feels free to seduce the woman. Paralyzed when in front of his object of love, Jean-FranÃ§ois accumulates blunders of every kind. He hence turns to Julien, one his patients who is in therapy to overcome his compulsive-obsessive flirting disorder. It's a totally absurd initiative on Jean-FranÃ§ois's part. But, even so...

movie.title: A Manipulative Mother
movie.description: The events of the play revolve around (Hia) Sabreen, who works as a seamstress in Mansoura, and for the mistreatment of the owner of the store, she decides to go to Cairo to work at the branch of sewing and she asks for her address in one of the shoe stores. There, she identifies with (Tayfour) Mamdouh Wafi, who works in the shop. It is recognized by the owner of the store (Hakkai) Mahmoud Al-Qalawi, and there are paradoxes that go out from him to be hit by a motorcycle in the field in front of the shop. Who trades in the currency. She discovers that she has stolen her money - so she can sympathize with her, and she will live with her in her apartment, and at the same time work in the shoe store. And Tayfour loves her.

movie.title: A Charming Stranger
movie.description: Mrs. EndrÃ©nyi, an old woman in Old Buda learns that her house is going to be demolished and she is going to get a new apartment. Since she would like her family members to have the same advantage, she takes them in her apartment.

movie.title: A Couple'S Secret
movie.description: Inspired by a street interview about married sex life a TV food show host accidentally finds a way to help his little problem in bed.

movie.title: A Perfect Couple
movie.description: An uptight bachelor tries his luck with a computer dating service and gets matched up with his polar opposite.

movie.title: Like Mother Like Daughter
movie.description: An attention-craving mother nearing 50, unemployed and living with her pregnant daughter and son-in-law, suddenly finds herself with child, too...

movie.title: The Criminal'S Son
movie.description: No description.

movie.title: A Boy'S Journey
movie.description: A story about a young boy who feels that he doesn't fit in. Born in Holland, he starts his quest meeting interesting people and experiencing different locations. Live actors, puppet animation, miniature theater sets, conveys this fun story.

movie.title: Crooked Cop
movie.description: A corrupt red oil kingpin enlists the aid of a female police officer to help find his son.

movie.title: Crazy About Him
movie.description: After a magical night together, Adri voluntarily turns himself into the psychiatric institution where Carla lives.

movie.title: Sundown: Vampire War
movie.description: Reclusive vampires lounge in a lonely American town. They wear sunscreen to protect themselves. A descendant of Van Helsing arrives with hilarious consequences.

movie.title: Parenting 101
movie.description: Suffering from empty nest syndrome, two lonely parents concoct a scheme to get their kids interested in them again: they pretend they've won the lottery.

movie.title: Mother-Daughter Road Trip

movie.title: In Bed With The Devil
movie.description: Frank Faust is a born loser. At some point it even becomes too much for his great love, Jennifer, who leaves him and flees to Munich. Frank's desperation is the best reason for Mephisto to show up and offer a suitable pact: reconciliation with Jennifer in exchange for Frank's soul. Shaken by his predicament, Frank finds it easy to agree to the hellish proposal. In order to win back his renegade lover, Mephisto transforms himself into a wide variety of prominent contemporaries who appear at Frank's side and publicly praise his qualities - especially for Jennifer to hear. The plan seems to be working perfectly, unless Mephisto suddenly reveals a completely new side to his personality...

movie.title: Unlucky Vacations
movie.description: Movie not found on TMDB.

movie.title: What Happened Last Night
movie.description: College students Danny and Sarah wake up one morning in bed next to each other after a night of hard partying, with no recollection of what happened the night before or how they met. Now it's up to them to figure it out.

movie.title: Hostage Honeymoon

movie.title: The Married Man
movie.description: The play revolves around Safwat El-Sherbiny, who comes out of the grave to tell Ghafir his story with his manager at work who was abusive to him, and was trying in various ways to get close to his beautiful wife, desirous of her.

movie.title: The Acting Coach
movie.description: Sebastian, a once-renowned actor turned reclusive teacher, lives with his cat in a beach house, haunted by past losses. An unexpected encounter challenges him to face his past and rediscover purpose in his life.

movie.title: The Summer Of Innocence
movie.description: Sensitive story of a British girl's awakening from childhood into life and love on vacation in France.

movie.title: Girls Night Out
movie.description: A group of girls taking a trip to celebrate a bachelorette party in which they will rediscover themselves.

movie.title: Girls Trip In Florida
movie.description: Four girlfriends take a trip to New Orleans for an annual festival and, along the way, rediscover their wild sides and strengthen the bonds of sisterhood.

movie.title: A Fabulous Performance
movie.description: Although Nobuyoshi and Saki just got married and moved into a new apartment, their relationship still lacks spark. Things start to change as they meet a weird fortune-teller who also happens to operate tours to hell. Without further ado the young couple books a honeymoon trip which takes them to the most bizarre, colorful and fun vision of hell you could ever dream of.

movie.title: Date With A Demon
movie.description: Unaware that she is the daughter of Mr. Shawkat, the CEO, Ahmed gets into an argument with Nahid. When the two meet in Alexandria coincidentally, Nahid disguises herself as a peasant and works a scheme to teach Ahmed an unforgettable lesson.

movie.title: The Reunion
movie.description: Four young men who were friends in high school reunite several years later to discover that they all have failed professionally and their love lives haven't really gone anywhere. They go on a quest to find and reconnect with their school sweethearts and finally achieve happiness.

movie.title: A Fresh Start
movie.description: Two men are released from prison and while keeping up appearances, they steal everything they can from the guards hugging them farewell.

movie.title: Rock Bottom
movie.description: An employee is harassed by his co-workers. Later, they ambush him and try to steal the company's money.

movie.title: Mid Air Encounter
movie.description: Kicsi DÃ¡niel, the young virtuoso pianist gets a separate apartment in the ten-storey block of flats. He rehearses all the time, irregularly, day and night, disturbing thus the peace of the dwellers in the thin-walled house. Inquisition begins in the name of equal rights for inhabitants.

movie.title: Dating A Rock Star
movie.description: An elderly man, Kosmas, gets involved in a fight and, trying to escape from the police, runs into Maritsa, who is standing in the museum garden waiting for the man of her dreams. He falls in love with her and they decide to get married, but all he knows about her is that she is looking for a husband through the marriage bureau of Pipi and Fifi.

movie.title: Great Minds Think Alike
movie.description: Three neighbors, all with OCD, each navigate a day of rituals and ruminationsâ€”until a tense encounter with a suspected car thief outside their apartment building brings their inner worlds together.
